description: The Wasabi Power BP727 battery and charger kit includes 2 batteries and one charger with a European plug and car adapter. All items come with a 3-year manufacturer warranty.Batteries replace: Canon BP727.Charger replaces: Canon CG-700.Note:Batteries are NOT decoded. Your camera will not display the battery's run time and must be charged with the included Wasabi Power charger.Compatible with the following Canon models:VIXIA HF M50VIXIA HF M52VIXIA HF M500VIXIA HF R30VIXIA HF R32VIXIA HF R40VIXIA HF R42VIXIA HF R50VIXIA HF R52VIXIA HF R300VIXIA HF R400VIXIA HF R500
title: Wasabi Power Battery (2-Pack) and Charger for Canon BP-727, CG-700 and Canon VIXIA HF M50, HF M52, HF M500, HF R30, HF R32, HF R40, HF R42, HF R50, HF R52, HF R300, HF R400, HF R500
